text: Abdullah Al-Barghash is a member of the Kuwaiti National Assembly from the fifth district. Born in 1962, Al-Barghash studied Customs Affairs and worked in the Customs Department before being elected to the National Assembly in 2008. While political parties are technically illegal in Kuwait, Al-Barghash affiliates with the Islamist and Salafi deputies. He is a member of the Ajman tribe. ==References== Category:Members of the National Assembly of Kuwait Category:Living people Category:1962 births
title: Abdullah AlـBarghash
